abstract: The head of its commercial aircraft division said that failure to keep the bank running would place Boeing at an unbeatable disadvantage to Airbus.
snippet: The head of its commercial aircraft division said that failure to keep the bank running would place Boeing at an unbeatable disadvantage to Airbus.
lead_paragraph: LONDON — The head of Boeing’s commercial aircraft division said on Sunday that he was optimistic that the United States Congress would ultimately agree to reauthorize funding to the Export-Import Bank, which guarantees billions of dollars in loans to foreign buyers of its airplanes.

headline.main: Boeing Optimistic That Export-Import Bank Will Get Funding
headline.print_headline: Boeing Optimistic Congress Will Renew Financing for Export-Import Bank
